mapper.select: select ROWNUM,T.* FROM(SELECT A.SUB_CODE,A.PRE_CAPA,A.CAPACITY,B.SUB_NAME,B.COMPLETE_PT,B.SUB_YEAR,B.T_SEMESTER,C.PROF_NAME,B.T_DEPT,B.SUB_DATE, B.SUB_TIME,B.SUB_ROOM,A.OPEN_YN,B.SUB_TYPE from HD_class_TB A,HD_SUBJECT_TB B,HD_PROFESSOR_TB C WHERE A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE AND A.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID ORDER BY A.OPEN_YN DESC)T

select count(*) from (select ROWNUM,T.* FROM(SELECT A.SUB_CODE,A.PRE_CAPA,A.CAPACITY,B.SUB_NAME,B.COMPLETE_PT,B.SUB_YEAR,B.T_SEMESTER,C.PROF_NAME,B.T_DEPT,B.SUB_DATE, B.SUB_TIME,B.SUB_ROOM,A.OPEN_YN,B.SUB_TYPE from HD_class_TB A,HD_SUBJECT_TB B,HD_PROFESSOR_TB C WHERE A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE AND A.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID ORDER BY A.OPEN_YN DESC)T)
